^
compilation terminated.

body:
I remove the files above, then compile pytorch, another error occurs:

[ 69%] Built target gloo
[ 73%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/nccl/gloo_cuda_generated_nccl.cu.o
In file included from /home/xiecw/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/nccl/nccl.cu:10:0:
/home/xiecw/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/gloo/nccl/nccl.h:12:18: fatal error: nccl.h: No such file or directory
 #include <nccl.h>

compilation terminated.
